title: Slow cooker paella
ingredients: ['6 tablespoons olive oil', '55g smoked streaky bacon', '170g chorizo, sliced', '1 onion, finely sliced', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1 red pepper, seeded and sliced', '1.5L chicken stock', '2 pinches saffron', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes, drained', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '900g boneless skinless chicken thighs', '500g paella rice', '450g raw unpeeled king prawns, deveined and legs removed', '450g fresh mussels', '225g garden peas', '1 tablespoon chopped spring onion', 'juice of 1/2 lemon', '1 bunch fresh flat leaf parsley, chopped']
